post.author: 배길상
post.content:
제가 알고있는 job agent 가 아래와 같이 Programmer 를 찿고 있습니다.

Linda Ramnares, Recruiter
Suite 250, 2 Robert Speck Parkway
Mississauga, Ontario L4Z 1H8
Phone: (905) 283-2535 x 1360
Fax: (905) 283-2544
Linda.Ramnares@SISYSTEMS.COM
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Sourcing Office : Toronto
Title : Programmer Analyst
Project Description : Our Client located in the GTA requires a contract Programmer Analyst for 240Days.

Description of Responsibilities/Deliverables

The Consultant will be responsible for providing services to the  Production Support team as follows:

• Modifying existing screens and programs for the Integrated Collection System (ICS)
• Developing new screens and programs as required
• Modifying interfaces between ICS and other systems
• Non-discretionary maintenance of ICS
• Production Support activities (including on-call support from time to time)
• Assisting in mentoring project staff and the production support team.
The Consultant responsibilities will also include assisting with some or all of the following tasks:

• Identification and analysis of business requirements
• Systems design
• Programming
• Unit, system, acceptance and performance testing
• Supporting systems implementation
• Investigating and resolving system problems
• Post-implementation support.

The Consultant will be required to:
• Complete work as assigned
• Provide progress/status information to Client Management
• Comply with Client security procedures and practices
• Comply with Client Conflict of Interest, and Confidentiality Guidelines
• Provide skills / knowledge transfer to appropriate Client staff.
Mandatory Requirements:
The Consultant must be able to demonstrate knowledge of, and experience in, the following skills, activities, or areas. The knowledge and experience must have been gained through work on a project(s) similar in size and scope to this project.

The following skills are Mandatory:
• COBOL/370
• JCL
• DB2
• SQL/QMF
• IMS DB/DC
• TELON (Online/Batch)
• TSO/ISPF/PDF
• Erwin Data Modeler
• Microsoft Suite of products (e.g. MS Project, MS Visio, MS Excel, MS Word).

Knowledge and experience in the following are highly desirable and are being sought in the Consultant:
• experience using office productivity tools, e.g. MS Office
• Windows NT/XP
• UDB Database Manager
• IBM Debug Tools
• IBM Fault Analyzer.
The Consultant must be able to demonstrate the ability to deal tactfully with people and have excellent interpersonal communication and writing skills.

The Client's current development environments are as follows:
Mainframe-based:
IBM, Z/OS, JES 2
DB2, IMS DB/DC
TSO/ISPF/PDF and COBOL 370
TELON
Standard IBM software utilities and JCL; and
Third party utilities e.g. FileManager (MVS,DB2), Easytrieve, IBM Debug Tools/Fault Analyzer.

PC-based and Client/Server based:

- IBM PC or compatible hardware and software
- Microsoft Active Directory and servers
- Microsoft Windows and .NET technologies
- AIX RS6000 data base servers
- DB2/UDB and ORACLE, Erwin
- Microsoft .NET VB, Visual Basic 6
- Microsoft Access 2003 full version
- PowerBuilder, Pro*C, MERCATOR (EDI sw), ENTRUST
- FileNet Imaging, Captiva InputAccel

Specialization and Skills :
    -  Software Development
          - COBOL   (5 - 7 years)
          - DB2   (5 - 7 years)
          - IMS/DC   (5 - 7 years)
          - JCL   (5 - 7 years)

Additional Requirements :
    - IMS DB/DC (5 - 7 years)
    - TELON (Online/Batch) (5 - 7 years)
    - TSO/ISPF/PDF (5 - 7 years)
    - Erwin Data Modeler (5 - 7 years)
    - • Microsoft Suite of products (e.g. MS Project, MS Visio, MS Excel, MS Word). (5 - 7 years)
    - experience using office productivity tools, e.g. MS Office (Capable)
    - Windows NT/XP
• UDB Database Manager
• IBM Debug Tools
• IBM Fault Analyzer. (Capable)

Start Date : May 31, 2010
End Date : Jan 24, 2011
Rate : Daily  Negotiable
post.title: Mainframe Cobol Programmer Analyst
